title: Before and After Pseudo Elements
body: This feature would extend the DOM tree in the DOM Explorer to include pseudo element as selectable elements (as if they were real nodes) so that the styles applied to them can be applied.

comments.body: Yet another simple feature that Edge doesn't have...

@Nick George Trident - IE or Edge - does not handle css generated pseudo elements like most other inspectors and the computed styles displays incorrectly (atleast on my Windows 10 Insider Preview build)
